    Function reference

    Datasets

    The following datasets are included in the package.

    berserk_choice
    Choice of berserking
    opening_choice
    Choice of a chess opening

    Data management

    Use these functions for data preparation.

    check_form()
    Check form.
    overview_effects()
    Overview of effects.
    prepare_data()
    Prepare empirical choice data.
    simulate_choices()
    Simulate choice data.
    train_test()
    Split choice data.
    plot(<RprobitB_data>)
    Plot method for RprobitB_data.

    Model fitting

    Use these function for model estimation.

    mcmc()
    Markov chain Monte Carlo simulation for probit model fitting.
    transform_fit()
    Change the length of the burn-in period, the thinning factor and the scale after Gibbs sampling.

    Model evaluation

    Use these functions for model evaluation.

    point_estimates()
    Compute point estimates of an RprobitB_fit.
    choice_probabilities()
    Return choice probabilities of an RprobitB_fit.
    log_likelihood()
    Compute log-likelihood of an RprobitB_fit.
    model_selection()
    Compare fitted models.
    preference_classification()
    Classify preferences of deciders.
    predict_choices()
    Predict choices.
    plot(<RprobitB_fit>)
    Plot method for RprobitB_fit.

    S3 classes

    These functions construct the S3 classes of RprobitB.

    RprobitB_data()
    Create object of class RprobitB_data.
    RprobitB_fit()
    Create object of class RprobitB_fit.
    RprobitB_gibbs_samples_statistics()
    Create object of class RprobitB_gibbs_samples_statistics.
    RprobitB_latent_classes()
    Create object of class RprobitB_latent_classes.
    RprobitB_normalization()
    Create object of class RprobitB_normalization.
    RprobitB_parameter()
    Create object of class RprobitB_parameter.

    Utilities

    These functions may be useful beyond RprobitB.

    delta()
    Matrix difference operator.
    is_covariance_matrix()
    Check covariance matrix properties.
    mvn_draw()
    Sample from multivariate normal distribution.
    rdirichlet()
    Draw from Dirichlet
    rwishart()
    Draw from a Wishart
    R_hat()
    Compute Gelman-Rubin statistic.
    set_mfrow()
    Balancing visualization of multiple figures.

    On this page
